Key Match Events: Fernando Tatis Jr.'s towering two-run home run highlighted a six-run second inning
Teoscar Hernández hit a grand slam with one out in the third
Post-Match Reflections: Fernando Tatis Jr. said he feeds off the crowd's energy
Mookie Betts apparently thought left fielder Jurickson Profar had robbed him of a home run
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played at Petco Park in San Diego, California
The Dodgers are on the brink of losing in the NLDS for the third straight season
Others: The Padres moved within one victory of eliminating the Dodgers in the NLDS for the second time in three seasons
The Dodgers opened the third by loading the bases on consecutive singles by Miguel Rojas, Shohei Ohtani and Mookie Betts before Teoscar Hernández hit a towering shot to straightaway center
